Sentencas: Grain boundary conductivity of samarium doped ceria electrolyte (SDC) depends on the space charge potential and oxygen vacancy concentration existing at the grain boundary region.
Titulo: Divalent cations modified grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here, we report the effect of co-doping 1 mol% divalent alkaline earth metals in samarium doped ceria (Ce(0.78)Sm(0.2)A(0.01)O(1.89), [ASDC], A = Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba) on the grain boundary conductivity.
Titulo: Divalent cations modified grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The increase (Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+) or decrease (Mg2+) in lattice parameter in comparison to SDC (0.5445 nm) depends on the ionic radii of the co-dopant.
Titulo: Divalent cations modified grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The oxygen vacancy concentration of ASDC system, quantified from the Raman spectra, increased from 2.98 x 10(21) cm(-3) (SDC) to 3.18 x 10(21) cm(-3).
Titulo: Divalent cations modified grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The samples sintered at 1400 degrees C for 5 h, resulted in a dense electrolyte with a relative density of 98-99%.
Titulo: Divalent cations modified grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Calcium co-doped SDC (CSDC) showed the highest conductivity of 2.04 x 10(-3) S/cm at 700 degrees C with activation energy of 0.90 eV.
Titulo: Divalent cations modified grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The oxygen vacancy profile at the space charge layer was found to be higher for CSDC while the potential reduced from 0.24 V (SDC) to 0.18 V. The observed lower space charge potential in co-doped SDC, contributed to the enhancement in oxygen vacancy concentration at the space charge layer and increased the grain boundary conductivity.
Titulo: Divalent cations modified grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus the present study highlights the correlation of space charge potential, oxygen vacancy concentration to grain boundary conductivity and provide a profound insights on the grain boundary understandings for improving the performance of the electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cell application.
Titulo: Divalent cations modified grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells
